resources.string: Apps with this permission can access/modify\nfiles stored on this device.
This permission allows access â€¨to your\nlocation unless disabled from settings.
When provided apps can share your address\nbook unless specified otherwise.
Apps with this permission can could take\nsnaps/record videos.
Apps with this permission can record\n your voice.
This enables apps to access your call\ndetails and other device info
This allows access to some sensors on your\ndevice, resulting in higher battery consumption.
Your calendar events and other info can\nbe accessed/modified.
Allows apps to read your entire sms history\nand could be misused.
